group_1.textLeft: | You can make others feel at ease...which I@may not be able to do... |
(However, for a senpai who has protected@others from disasters...)
(Perhaps it's only natural...)
| ...Magical Girl reactions. |
So why didn't you save me any?!

group_1.textRight: As I've already explained to you...
We usually don't sell many, so we don't@prepare a lot.
You really are the biggest glutton in@Kamihama, you know that?

group_1.textLeft: But I didn't expect them all to sell@out today...!

group_1.textRight: I'm surprised, too...
Well, maybe what happened is...
You even ate your own luck while you were@wolfing down some food?

group_1.textLeft: Luck can be eaten...?!

group_1.textRight: Knowing you, it's not impossible.
[chara:300901:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Whoa, Sakurako?!
We managed to reach you while talking@the whole way.
Oh, we really did.
I really shouldn't let my gourmand blood@slow me down while food is on the line.

group_1.textLeft: | You wanted to see me? |

group_1.textRight: I heard you've been judging a sakura tree@over here.
We decided to stop by while we're out shopping.

group_1.textLeft: Is it a hit or miss?
Depending on the result, Manaka might be@asked to do some cooking.

group_1.textRight: And that's about it.

group_1.textLeft: | I see. |

group_1.textRight: So is it suitable for cherry blossom viewing?

group_1.textLeft: | ...Perhaps. |
| I've also heard that Walnut's served food@here in the past. |

group_1.textRight: You're well informed!@[chara:300901:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:300901:cheek_0][chara:300901:face_mtn_ex_012.exp.json][chara:300901:lipSynch_1]I'm happy you know about that!
However, back then, we served confectionaries@instead of Western cooking.
They were cherry blossom-scented cookies...

group_1.textLeft: Just like today!
The one, precious day of the year when@these cookies are sold!

group_1.textRight: Please don't suddenly take over!

group_1.textLeft: | Cherry blossom-scented cookies...@Could it be these? |

group_1.textRight: Wha...?! Sakurako, why do you have them?!
Because they're Sakurakookies?!

group_1.textLeft: | A kind grandmother gave them to me. |
| I can't eat them, so you may have them. |

group_1.textRight: Really?! For real?! Seriously?!

group_1.textLeft: | Yes, I can't eat them. |

group_1.textRight: [chara:302401:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Thank you Sakurako! I'll never forget how@grateful and moved I am!
Honestly... You're being so overdramatic.

group_1.textLeft: There's only so few chances to eat them,@you know?!
I can't believe you don't understand the grief@that the whole world will go through...!

group_1.textRight: No, with so few people buying it, it's not@gonna spread that far...
By the way, Sakurako.
Do you mean an old married couple gave@them to you?

group_1.textLeft: | That's correct. |

group_1.textRight: If you know the two of them, please give@them my thanks.
My father mentioned them to me.
He said that couple always show up when@the cookies are on sale.

group_1.textLeft: | I don't know if I'll meet them again, but I@don't mind passing the message. |

group_1.textRight: Thank you very much!
For now, I'll assume I should start preparing@for the cherry blossom viewing party.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:302401:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Ahhhhhh...this is really the best cookie in@the world...

group_1.textRight: Come on, Tsumugi, let's get going.

group_1.textLeft: Yeshhh...
| Senior-senpai, so many people pass through@here. |
| Every day, every week, every year...for over@100 years...you've watched over them...? |
| Do you know what Walnut's was like before@Manaka was around...? |
| Do you know what Grandfather and@Grandmother were like 80 years ago...? |
| Have you received the prayers of countless@different people? |
| I can't imagine it...not at all... |
| Because I exist to watch over only four girls@as the Eternal Sakura. |
| But you have been watching over thousands@upon thousands of people over the years. |
| I respect you. |

group_1.narration: | Uwasa don't change, they live according to the content@of their [textBlue:Rumor]. They're never permitted to go against it.@They exist as invariable parts of an unchanging story. |
| They have no thoughts of a beginning or an end.@They merely fulfill their roles. |
| But...for the first time, I realize...@Time is passing around us... |
